circle.name: ✘ Circle
circle.info: a round plane figure whose boundary (the circumference) consists of points equidistant from a fixed point (the center)

triangle.name: ✔︎ Triangle
triangle.info: a plane figure with three straight sides and three angles

rectangle.name: ✘ Square
rectangle.info: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles

decagon.name: ✘ Square
decagon.info: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles

four-points-star.name: ✘ Square
four-points-star.info: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles

octagon.name: ✘ Square
octagon.info: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles

eight-point-star.name: ✘ Square
eight-point-star.info: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles

eight-point-red-star.name: ✘ Square
eight-point-red-star.info: a plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles
